50. $y=\sqrt{1+4x+4x^2}-3=|2x+1|-3=\begin{cases}2x+1-3=2x-2,\ x\geqslant-\cfrac{1}{2},\\ -2x-1-3=-2x-4,\ x<-\cfrac{1}{2}.\end{cases}$
$$$$% TIKZ_ID{8_klass_utf8-chapter006-050-solution-diag001.svg}
